channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MA

item.title: Report X-2023121064
item.description:
Report X-2023121064

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-30T17:46:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-08
  • City: LYNNFIELD
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE PACKAGE WAS UNLOADED, PALED AND SENT TO THE DOGHOUSE. THE PACKAGE WAS THEN LOADED ONTO THE PACKAGE CAR. THERE THE PRELOADER NOTICED A MILD ODOR COMING FROM THE PACKAGE. THE PRELOADER LEFT THE AREA AND NOTIFIED HER SUPERVISOR. THE SUPERVISOR CALLED FOR DESIGNATED RESPONDER. THE RESPONDER, FOLLOWING THE DECISION TREE AND APPROPRIATE RESPNSE SHEET, PLACED THE LEAKING PACKAGE INTO A LINED SPILL TUB. THE EQUIPMENT WAS CLEANED FOLLOWING THE DECONTAMINATION CHECKLIST. THE PACKAGE WAS THEN TRANSPORTED TO THE DMP AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. IT EAS THERE THE PACKAGE CONTAINED 2 UNDECLARED AEROSOL CANS.
